column1:
Overall Sentiment Percentages
Cleaniness: 0%
Amenities: 63.29%
Location: 66.39%
Services: 58.08%
General: 63.29%

Suggestions:
Cleaniness: Increase cleanliness in the location by regularly maintaining the area and double-checking to ensure it is up to standards.
Amenities: Increase the number of amenities available to the customers, such as providing more recreational activities, food options, entertainment, etc. 
Location: Improve the safety and convenience of the location by providing better lighting, well-maintained roads, secure parking areas, etc. 
Services: Increase the customer service standards and ensure that employees are adequately trained in customer service standards.
General: Increase the overall value of the area by working with the local government to create incentives to attract businesses and customers, such as tax cuts, grants, etc.
